item.title: Why The Feds Can’t Trust Utah To Achieve The Death Penalty For Charlie Kirk’s Murderer
item.description: As President Trump vows a full federal investigation, Attorney General Pam Bondi needs to file federal charges that carry the death penalty.

item.title: The Only Way To End Leftist Violence Is To Defeat Leftism Itself

item.title: We Are Not Going To Have A Debate About Free Speech
item.description: The cancellation of Jimmy Kimmel’s show doesn’t matter. What matters is the left’s embrace of political violence.

item.title: Late-Night Hack Jimmy Kimmel Has Only Himself To Blame For His Suspension
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel is not a free speech victim. He's a leftist joke who said something really stupid and is now paying a professional price.

item.title: Kimmel’s Suspension Gives Local Stations The Chance To Beat Back Hollywood’s Content Monopoly
